turns.content:
Validate this visualization data circuit implementation:

COMPLETED WORK:
1. OKLCH Integration - replaced all legacy HSL calls (hslColor, interpolateHSL, _oklchToHex, _dimColor) with COLOR engine calls
2. Property Query System - wired initPropertyQuery() in app.js after Graph creation
3. Graph accessors now use Q.node(n, 'color') and Q.node(n, 'size') for resolution
4. UPB bindings use VIS_STATE field names (colorBy, sizeBy, edgeBy)
5. Build pipeline loads 52 modules including 4 new Property Query modules
6. Circuit Breaker passes 9/9

EVIDENCE:
- grep for legacy HSL: 0 matches in modules/
- grep for COLOR.: 53 matches across 10 files
- grep for initPropertyQuery in generated HTML: 9 matches
- pytest: 348 passed, 6 errors (pre-existing LHI issue)

ARCHITECTURE:
VIS_STATE.colorBy → Property Query → UPB bindings → COLOR engine → Graph accessors → WebGL

Rate the implementation quality 1-10 and identify any gaps or risks.
